query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST121 ( MANDT ,CS121_UPN ,CS121_CST ,CS121_SPT ,CS121_NAM ,CS121_CSB ,CS121_GNO ,CS121_NUM ,CS121_CGB ,CS121_JUC ,CS121_ZIB ,CS121_P1B ,CS121_P2B ,CS121_GSH ,CS121_ZIE ,CS121_P1E ,CS121_P2E ,EGNAME ,EPNAME ,CS121_CDP ,CS121_TEA ,CS121_GYA ,CS121_SJU ,CS121_STR ,CS121_BGB ,CS121_BHB ,CS121_RIV ,CS121_RDT ,CS121_JZR ,CS121_SZR ,CS121_CHR ,CS121_RES ,CS121_SMS ,CS121_TEB ,CS121_GYB ,CS121_ZIC ,CS121_P1C ,CS121_P2C ,CS121_TEC ,CS121_GYC ,CS121_RNM ,CS121_ZID ,CS121_P1D ,CS121_P2D ,CS121_RN2 ,CS121_TED ,CS121_GYD ,CS121_JSH ,CS121_SDT ,CS121_SDJ ,CS121_EM1 ,CS121_EM2 ,CS121_CH2 ,CS121_TE2 ,CS121_GY2 ,CS121_GBN ,CS121_SLA ,CS121_TMK ,CS121_RSN ,CS121_JNO ,CS121_CAR ,CS121_CH3 ,CS121_EM3 ,CS121_SM3 ,CS121_TE3 ,CS121_GY3 ,KUNNR ,CS121_TE4 ,CS121_TE5 ,ZTERM ,CS121_DZIB ,CS121_DP1B ,CS121_DP2B ,CS121_DZIE ,CS121_DP1E ,CS121_DP2E ,CS121_NZIB ,CS121_MEMO ,MDATE ,MTIME ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# ,#UPN# ,#CST# ,(SELECT COALESCE(MAX(ZSITE_NM),'') AS ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND POSID = CAST(#UPN# AS CHAR(11)) FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) ,#NAM# ,#CSB# ,#GNO_ENCRYPT# ,0 ,(CASE WHEN LENGTH(RTRIM(CAST(#GNO# AS CHAR(14))))=10 THEN '1' WHEN LENGTH(RTRIM(CAST(#GNO# AS CHAR(14))))=13 THEN '2' ELSE '0' END) ,#JUC# ,REPLACE(CAST(#ZIB# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-','') ,#P1B# ,#P2B# ,#GSH# ,REPLACE(CAST(#ZIE# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-','') ,#P1E# ,#P2E# ,#EGNAME# ,#EPNAME# ,#CDP# ,#TEA# ,#GYA# ,#SJU# ,#STR# ,#BGB# ,#BHB# ,#RIV# ,#RDT# ,#JZR# ,#SZR# ,#CHR# ,#RES# ,CASE WHEN CAST(#CHK_SMS# AS CHAR(1)) = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END ,#TEB# ,#GYB# ,REPLACE(CAST(#ZIC# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-','') ,#P1C# ,#P2C# ,#TEC# ,#GYC# ,#RNM# ,REPLACE(CAST(#ZID# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-','') ,#P1D# ,#P2D# ,#RN2# ,#TED# ,#GYD# ,#JSH# ,#SDT# ,#SDJ# ,#EM1# ,#EM2# ,#CH2# ,#TE2# ,#GY2# ,#GBN# ,#SLA# ,#TMK# ,CASE CAST(#RSN# AS VARCHAR(1)) WHEN 'N' THEN '1' ELSE '2' END ,#JNO# ,#CAR# ,#CH3# ,#EM3# ,CASE WHEN CAST(#CHK_SM3# AS CHAR(1)) = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END ,#TE3# ,#GY3# ,#KUNNR# ,#TE4# ,#TE5# ,#ZTERM# ,REPLACE(CAST(#DZIB# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-','') ,#DP1B# ,#DP2B# ,REPLACE(CAST(#DZIE# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-','') ,#DP1E# ,#DP2E# ,#NZIB# ,#MEMO# ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) )
